definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research

sentences.english: His condition continued to improve and he was discharged after 11 days of hospitalization.
sentences.chinese: 於是他在住院的第十一天，經主治醫師評估過後出院。

sentences.english: By-and-by the attending physician requests an X-ray and blood test.
sentences.chinese: 然後主治醫師要求進行X光和血液檢查。

sentences.english: Guan Jinghong, female, doctor in charge, excels at breast cancer's treatment.
sentences.chinese: 關競紅，女，主治醫師，擅長乳腺癌的治療。

sentences.english: If you have diarrhea that is watery or has blood in it, call your doctor.
sentences.chinese: 如果腹瀉拉水或帶有血跡，應向你的主治醫師諮詢。

sentences.english: Now, he is an attending surgeon at the Institute of Neuromedicine, Zhujiang Hospital, Southern Medical University.
sentences.chinese: 現爲南方醫科大學珠江醫院神經醫學研究所主治醫師。

sentences.english: Talk to your doctor if you have any concerns about the medications.
sentences.chinese: 要是你有任何對藥物的擔憂，請與你的主治醫師談談。

sentences.english: , where she was an attending psychiatrist.
sentences.chinese: 在那裏她是精神病研究主治醫師。

sentences.english: The physician-in-charge is using the hemostat to stop the patient's bleeding.
sentences.chinese: 主治醫師正用止血鉗給病人止血。

sentences.english: The surgeon came in and marked my forehead with a large black arrow pointing down at my left eye.
sentences.chinese: 主治醫師在我的左眼上花了一個大大的黑色的圈。

definition: health bureau (or office, or department, or agency)
consultation (medical)/to meet for diagnosis/(by extension) consultation of different specialists

pinyin: Guang3 zhou1 Zhong1 yi1 yao4 Da4 xue2

definition: Chinese and Western medicine/a doctor trained in Chinese and Western medicine
